quote:
My girlfriend said she wanted my to dominate her.
So I said, "Ok, let's play Scrabble."
author: MyqKaplan

quote: Dogs have masters. Cats have staff.
author: Anonymous

quote:
What Orwell failed to predict was that we'd buy the cameras ourselves,

and that our biggest fear would be that nobody was watching.
author: Keith Lowell Jensen

quote: My mother never saw the irony in calling me a son-of-a-bitch.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: A diplomat is someone who can tell you to go to hell in such a way that you will look forward to the trip.
author: Caskie Stinnet

quote: I asked God for a bike, but I know God doesnâ€™t work that way. So I stole a bike and asked for forgiveness.
author: Emo Philips

quote: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won't expect it back.
author: Oscar Wilde
